body_html:
I had the same problem:
F tensorflow/core/kernels/conv_ops.cc:605] Check failed: stream->parent()->GetConvolveAlgorithms(&algorithms)

The solution for me was downgrading from cudnn 7.1.2 to 7.005.

body:
I had the same problem:
F tensorflow/core/kernels/conv_ops.cc:605] Check failed: stream->parent()->GetConvolveAlgorithms(&algorithms)

The solution for me was downgrading from cudnn 7.1.2 to 7.005.
